body:
This looks good to me. I have some concerns about the visibility state, but I'd be fine with it if doing it in Redux is painful.

I also wonder if we want to be able to support multiple notifications at once, so having an array of notifications that pop off after 10 seconds/being closed instead of a singleton. That might be premature though.
